Name: Utterance of Marvels: Part II
QuestDesc: Amidst a ripple of Reverberations, you hear the call... As you unravel your past, a new path unfolds before you, beckoning from the unknown.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm gonna get you one you can absorb. I never go back on my promise! Your hero Chixia's on the hunt!

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can you reenact what you did before?

Options.PlotLineKey: I don't have the feeling of being pushed like I did before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, maybe you can only absorb the powerful ones with your body?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or does it have to be a certain type of Tacet Discord?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or maybe...

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You attempt to absorb another Echo with your body but fail. Confusion settles among everyone about the nature of your abilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe we should give your Terminal a whirl?

Chapters.Title: Absorb the Reverberation and obtain an Echo

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yay! It worked!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've never seen a gourd quite like yours before, but it sure is working just fine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Your Terminal's got a different look, but the functions are pretty much the same.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look! Jinzhou City's just up ahead!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Rover?
Hehe, there you are.
My dearest...
...seed of fate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you approach the city, you have an uneasy feeling of being watched. A mysterious girl stands from a hidden vantage point, her gaze fixed upon you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alrighty. What should we do next?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shall we go grab a bite?

Options.PlotLineKey: We should visit the City Hall.
I should go get my body check-up.
Let's focus on the task at hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am to return to the Academy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The anomalies at the Gorges of Spirits, the resurgence of that Tacet Field, and the many Waveworn Phenomena occurrences... I should report them in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I'll go submit our report, and prepare the documentation needed for Rover's audience with the Magistrate while I'm there.

Options.PlotLineKey: Sounds like a lot of work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the political hub of Jinzhou, and where the <ano=Data Repository>Grand Library</ano> is located.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The City Hall is an important place. Seeking an audience with the Magistrate isn't too difficult, but there are still rules to follow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It may take some time, but there won't be too much paperwork.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I guess I'll take Rover over to the Nexus Tower for registration first, and we'll just hang out for a while.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Being new to Jinzhou and all, {Male=he;Female=she} can't be left standing outside the City Hall with nothing to do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hospitality is our local speciality, you know!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I'll leave you in Chixia's care, Rover. Is that alright with you? I'll give you a call once the paperwork is done.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leave it to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll send the Branch of Resonmedical Science a notice. We need to conduct a throughout physical examination on you to make sure you are fine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come visit the Academy after your audience if you have no other plans.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. A physical examination would be required to determine if any disease is present. If no medical issues are found, we'll conduct further monitoring and analysis to understand what happened to your body.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, we won't do anything without your consent.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The unique nature of your condition requires specialized treatment only available in the Huaxu Academy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And your body is bound to arouse the interest of many researchers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Myself included.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi, I think your last sentence could be worded better...

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. I agree that my phrasing lacked the attention to detail. Please allow me to reorganize my words.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You guys done yet?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's the hold up. Let's move, then I'll have more time to show Rover around!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've got loads of fun in Jinzhou! We can go watch Liondances, Hero Plays, Stand-up Shows, and then maybe the Martial Championships... Plus tons of different treats to try out. You think it, we have it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Upon arriving in Jinzhou City, the group prepares to part ways. You leave with Chixia for the Nexus Tower and make plans to meet Yangyang at City Hall later.
